external_games.name: Risen 2: Dark Waters - Air Temple DLC

name: Risen 2: Dark Waters - The Air Temple
summary: Gargoyles have infested the world of Risen 2: Dark Waters. Explore the mysterious Air Temple to uncover the mystery that surrounds it as you embark on an extensive new quest. Explore and discover an additional island with new characters, quests and enemies.
